title: Germany Goes Low-Tech To Foil U.S. Spying
teaser: Going off the grid is one way to shake off cyberspies. Germany is thinking about doing so by bringing back the typewriter, but Spy Museum historian Vince Houghton tells NPR's Scott Simon that it's not likely to work.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
